member.name: T:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.Extensions.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for to extract user information from claims.

member.name: M:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.Extensions.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.GetUserId(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: Gets the current authenticated user's ID from claims.
member.param: The claims principal (typically from HttpContext.User).
member.returns: The user ID as a Guid, or null if not found or invalid.

member.name: M:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.Extensions.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.GetUserIdOrThrow(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: Gets the current authenticated user's ID from claims, throwing an exception if not found.
member.param: The claims principal (typically from HttpContext.User).
member.returns: The user ID as a Guid.
member.exception: Thrown when user ID claim is not found or invalid.

member.name: M:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.Extensions.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.GetUserRole(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: Gets the current authenticated user's role from claims.
member.param: The claims principal (typically from HttpContext.User).
member.returns: The user role, or null if not found.

member.name: M:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.Extensions.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.GetUserEmail(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: Gets the current authenticated user's email from claims.
member.param: The claims principal (typically from HttpContext.User).
member.returns: The user email, or null if not found.

member.summary: Checks if the current user is authenticated.
member.param: The claims principal (typically from HttpContext.User).

member.name: M:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.Extensions.ClaimsPrincipalExtensions.HasRole(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the current user has a specific role.

The role to check for.
member.returns: True if the user has the role, false otherwise.

member.name: T:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.HangfireAuthorizationFilter.HangfireAuthorizationFilter
member.summary: Authorization filter for Hangfire dashboard. In development, allows all access. In production, should be secured with proper authorization.

member.summary: Provides JWT token generation for authenticated users.

member.name: M:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.JWTTokenService.IJwtTokenService.GenerateToken(System.Guid,System.String,Megabin_Web.Shared.Domain.Enums.UserRoles)
member.summary: Generates a JWT access token for the specified user.
member.param: The user's unique identifier.
The user's email address.
The user's role (Admin, User, or Driver).

member.name: T:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.JWTTokenService.JwtOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for JWT token generation and validation.

member.name: P:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.JWTTokenService.JwtOptions.Secret
member.summary: Secret key for signing JWT tokens. MUST be at least 32 characters (256 bits). Should be stored in User Secrets for development and secure vaults in production.

member.name: P:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.JWTTokenService.JwtOptions.Issuer
member.summary: Token issuer identifier. Typically the application name or domain. Default: "MegabinWebAPI"

member.name: P:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.JWTTokenService.JwtOptions.Audience
member.summary: Token audience identifier. Typically the client application or domain. Default: "MegabinWebClient"

member.name: P:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.JWTTokenService.JwtOptions.ExpirationMinutes
member.summary: Token expiration time in minutes. Default: 480 minutes (8 hours)

member.name: T:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.JWTTokenService.JwtTokenService
member.summary: Implementation of JWT token generation service.

member.name: M:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.JWTTokenService.JwtTokenService.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IOptions{Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.JWTTokenService.JwtOptions},Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.JWTTokenService.JwtTokenService})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: JWT configuration options.
Logger for JWT token service operations.

member.name: T:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.MapBoxService.IMapboxService
member.summary: Service for searching and validating addresses. Provides geocoding and autocomplete functionality using Mapbox.

member.name: M:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.MapBoxService.IMapboxService.GeocodeAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Converts an address string into geographic coordinates.
member.param: The complete address to geocode.
ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code for filtering results (e.g., "ZA" for South Africa).
Cancellation token for the async operation.
member.returns: Location coordinates if found, null if address cannot be geocoded.

member.name: M:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.MapBoxService.IMapboxService.AutocompleteAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Provides address suggestions as user types (autocomplete). Used for interactive address input to prevent typos and ensure valid addresses.
member.param: Partial address text entered by user (minimum 2 characters).
ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code for filtering results (e.g., "ZA" for South Africa).
Maximum number of suggestions to return (1-20).
Cancellation token for the async operation.
member.returns: List of address suggestions with coordinates. Empty list if no matches found.

member.name: T:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.MapBoxService.MapboxOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for Mapbox API integration.

member.name: P:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.MapBoxService.MapboxOptions.BaseUrl
member.summary: The base URL for Mapbox APIs. Default: https://api.mapbox.com

member.name: P:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.MapBoxService.MapboxOptions.AccessToken
member.summary: Mapbox access token (API key) for authentication. Required for all API requests. Should be stored in User Secrets for security. Get your token at: https://account.mapbox.com/access-tokens/

member.name: T:Megabin_Web.Shared.Infrastructure.OpenRouteService.IRouteOptimizationService
member.summary: Service for optimizing multi-vehicle routes using OpenRouteService VROOM engine. Handles capacity-constrained vehicle routing for daily waste collection scheduling.
Optimizes collection routes across multiple drivers with vehicle capacity constraints. Assigns jobs to drivers, sequences stops efficiently, and inserts depot returns when vehicles reach capacity.
member.param: Collection jobs to be assigned and routed (typically ~1000 daily jobs).
Available drivers with their start locations and vehicle capacities (typically ~100 drivers).
Depot locations where drivers can dump collected rubbish.
Cancellation token for the async operation.
member.returns: A containing optimized routes for each driver, any jobs that couldn't be assigned, and aggregate distance/duration metrics.
member.remarks: Uses VROOM (Vehicle Routing Open-source Optimization Machine) via OpenRouteService. The optimization assigns each job to exactly one driver, prioritizing proximity to driver start locations. Routes are balanced to minimize total distance while respecting vehicle capacity constraints. When a driver reaches capacity, a depot stop is automatically inserted before continuing to remaining jobs.
